entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 2:48 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: ENE 32 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
